caption: At the beginning of the video, a girl and a robotic head appeared on a deserted land. They searched for food in the land and finally found a potato and a worm. There were peculiar creatures on this land, trees breathing with their lungs, colorful insects, and snakes lived underground. After arriving home, the girl made some food from the worms and fed it to her paralyzed father through a stomach tube. And her father communicated with the girl through that robotic head. Afterwards, they arrived in a laboratory. Itâ€™s dark inside and there was a skeleton on a chair.
